## BammDeposit.whatChanged() method

Calculate the difference between the `currentTHUSD` in this Bamm Deposit and `thatTHUSD`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
whatChanged(thatUSD: Decimalish): BammDepositChange<Decimal> | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  thatUSD | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) |  |

**Returns:**

[BammDepositChange](./lib-base.bammdepositchange.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt; \| undefined

An object representing the change, or `undefined` if the deposited amounts are equal.
